tool_description: The openSquat is an open-source project for phishing domain and domain squatting detection by searching daily newly registered domains impersonating legit domains.
title: openSquat

api_list.name: Get Daily Domains
api_list.description: Get the daily list of domains that have been registered in the past day that have a similar word to {keyword} - the keyword should not contain any domain, e.g: Google
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opensquat1.p.rapidapi.com/{keyword}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opensquat1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Find domains registered today that are similar to the keyword 'Amazon'.
Can you check for any new domains that resemble 'Facebook'?
Search for domains registered in the last 24 hours that are similar to 'Twitter'.
Get a list of domains that mimic 'PayPal' and were registered today.
Identify any new domains that are similar to 'Instagram'.
Look up domains registered today that are similar to 'Netflix'.
Find any domains that were registered today and are similar to 'LinkedIn'.
Check for domains registered in the past day that resemble 'Spotify'.
Search for domains similar to 'eBay' that were registered today.
Get the list of domains registered today that are similar to 'Dropbox'.
